attributes.action: Start an urgent NAO investigation into the contracts for PPE used in England.
attributes.additional_details:
There have been numerous assertions on social media and the press of  the mismanagement of contract placing and the non-delivery of some PPE as a consequence.
The National Audit Office is independent of the Government and skilled in establishing the facts.
attributes.background: The investigation should look at the whether decisions were made with objectivity, integrity,  and represent good value for money.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  This would be a matter for the National Audit Office, who are already undertaking some work in this area:

https://www.nao.org.uk/work-in-progress/supplying-the-nhs-and-adult-social-care-sector-with-personal-protective-equipment-ppe/
